desc.en: A festival is held in D.U. in celebration of Valentine's Day. Sensei goes on patrol after the Valkyrie Police School's Fubuki and Kirino request assistance in maintaining the security of the festival.
desc.jp: A festival is held in D.U. in celebration of Valentine's Day. Sensei goes on patrol after the Valkyrie Police School's Fubuki and Kirino request assistance in maintaining the security of the festival.
desc.thai: A festival is held in D.U. in celebration of Valentine's Day. Sensei goes on patrol after the Valkyrie Police School's Fubuki and Kirino request assistance in maintaining the security of the festival.
desc.ko: A festival is held in D.U. in celebration of Valentine's Day. Sensei goes on patrol after the Valkyrie Police School's Fubuki and Kirino request assistance in maintaining the security of the festival.
desc.zh_tw: 为了迎接情人节的到来，D.U.自治区举办了一场庆典。在女武神警察学园的吹雪和桐乃的拜托之下，老师接下了庆典周边的治安巡逻工作。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 为了迎接情人节的到来，D.U.自治区举办了一场庆典。在女武神警察学园的吹雪和桐乃的拜托之下，老师接下了庆典周边的治安巡逻工作。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 为了迎接情人节的到来，D.U.自治区举办了一场庆典。在女武神警察学园的吹雪和桐乃的拜托之下，老师接下了庆典周边的治安巡逻工作。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 为了迎接情人节的到来，D.U.自治区举办了一场庆典。在女武神警察学园的吹雪和桐乃的拜托之下，老师接下了庆典周边的治安巡逻工作。

desc.en: Kirino and Fubuki, two students from the Public Safety Bureau, asked Sensei to patrol with them on Valentine's Day.
desc.jp: Kirino and Fubuki, two students from the Public Safety Bureau, asked Sensei to patrol with them on Valentine's Day.
desc.thai: Kirino and Fubuki, two students from the Public Safety Bureau, asked Sensei to patrol with them on Valentine's Day.
desc.ko: Kirino and Fubuki, two students from the Public Safety Bureau, asked Sensei to patrol with them on Valentine's Day.
desc.zh_tw: 来自生活安全局的吹雪和桐乃两位学生来找老师，希望能与他们在情人节那天一起巡逻。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 来自生活安全局的吹雪和桐乃两位学生来找老师，希望能与他们在情人节那天一起巡逻。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 来自生活安全局的吹雪和桐乃两位学生来找老师，希望能与他们在情人节那天一起巡逻。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 来自生活安全局的吹雪和桐乃两位学生来找老师，希望能与他们在情人节那天一起巡逻。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.thai: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.ko: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。
desc.zh_tw: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: The street was crowded with people. All kinds of shops have signs with various chocolates promotion and discounts. As Sensei enjoyed the celebration, Sensei met two Helmet Gang membered and accidentally had trouble with them.
desc.jp: The street was crowded with people. All kinds of shops have signs with various chocolates promotion and discounts. As Sensei enjoyed the celebration, Sensei met two Helmet Gang membered and accidentally had trouble with them.
desc.thai: The street was crowded with people. All kinds of shops have signs with various chocolates promotion and discounts. As Sensei enjoyed the celebration, Sensei met two Helmet Gang membered and accidentally had trouble with them.
desc.ko: The street was crowded with people. All kinds of shops have signs with various chocolates promotion and discounts. As Sensei enjoyed the celebration, Sensei met two Helmet Gang membered and accidentally had trouble with them.
desc.zh_tw: 大街上人山人海，各种店铺都打出了各种巧克力和优惠的招牌。就在老师享受庆典时，老师遇到了两名头盔圈成员，结果与他们不小心起了冲突。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大街上人山人海，各种店铺都打出了各种巧克力和优惠的招牌。就在老师享受庆典时，老师遇到了两名头盔圈成员，结果与他们不小心起了冲突。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大街上人山人海，各种店铺都打出了各种巧克力和优惠的招牌。就在老师享受庆典时，老师遇到了两名头盔圈成员，结果与他们不小心起了冲突。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 大街上人山人海，各种店铺都打出了各种巧克力和优惠的招牌。就在老师享受庆典时，老师遇到了两名头盔圈成员，结果与他们不小心起了冲突。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.thai:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.ko:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
desc.zh_tw:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.thai: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.ko: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。
desc.zh_tw: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
desc.zh_tw: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.en: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.jp: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.thai: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?

desc.zh_tw: 奇普托斯迎來了情人節！桐乃和吹雪帶著老師一起在如往年般盛大的活動會場巡邏。少女們的戀情，決勝負的一天開始了！
desc.zh_cn_jp: 奇普托斯迎来了情人节！桐乃和吹雪带着老师一起在如往年般盛大的活动会场巡逻。少女们的热情，决胜负的一天开始了！
